    org.pac4j.oidc.config.OidcConfiguration.getStateData()
    org.pac4j.core.util.JavaSerializationHelper.getTrustedPackages()
    use JavaSerializationHelper.addTrustedPackages(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>) and JavaSerializationHelper.addTrustedClasses(java.util.Collection<java.lang.Class<?>>). In later releases this method will return a copy of TrustedPackages with type Set.
    org.pac4j.saml.config.SAML2Configuration.setAuthnContextClassRef(String)
    org.pac4j.saml.config.SAML2Configuration.setDestinationBindingType(String)
    org.pac4j.oauth.config.OAuth20Configuration.setStateData(String)
    org.pac4j.oauth.client.FacebookClient.setStateData(String)
    org.pac4j.oidc.config.OidcConfiguration.setStateData(String)
    org.pac4j.core.util.JavaSerializationHelper.setTrustedPackages(List<String>)
    use JavaSerializationHelper.addTrustedPackages(java.util.Collection<java.lang.String>), JavaSerializationHelper.addTrustedPackage(java.lang.String) and JavaSerializationHelper.clearTrustedPackages()
  • Deprecated Constructors 
    Constructor and Description
    org.pac4j.saml.profile.impl.AbstractSAML2ResponseValidator(SAML2SignatureTrustEngineProvider, Decrypter, LogoutHandler)
    this constructor does not accept a replay cache, replay protection will be disabled
